top10_tweets_like: Bivariate choropleth maps are great to show relations between two variables. The tmap #rstats package doesn't implement bivariate maps yet, but with some additional coding they can be done. See examples at https://t.co/t1dZxVvODN based on the work of @maps4thought #tmap #rspatial https://t.co/AlAeFd19lD
